positions.title: Cognizant
positions.description:
• Twelve years of experience working with clients dispersed across regions such as India, Singapore, China, Australia, and the USA, over seven years of which have been at Luxembourg, Germany, and the USA.
• Led the group of database administrators to support end-to-end database infrastructure service.
• Delivered vital consistency through introduction and implementation of enterprise-wide set of database standards for installation, configuration, tuning, coding, and maintenance.
• Installed and maintained Microsoft SQL Server, Oracle, and MongoDB database instances.
• Designed and implemented complex database architecture such as the implementation of SQL Native backup strategy, Data compression for complex Data Warehouse systems, and implementation for In-Memory optimized object conversion, TDE with Azure vault on AlwaysOn Availability Group.
• Implemented and configured for database high availability such as Log Shipping on the same server, on to a different server, across domains or workgroups, or two different versions of SQL Server.
• Cross-platform DB migration between Oracle to SQL Server using SSMA 6.2, Access to SQL Server
• Implemented, Tested and maintained applications on SQL Server 2012 and SQL SERVER 2016 applications on Windows platform.
• Implemented SQL Server Partition for Archival and Purging automation for the production database.
• Written various reusable scripts for database maintenance, supported clustered and non-clustered environments as well as log shipping for disaster recovery.
• Performed extensive follow-up procedures to obtain, update, and validate information; maintained an exceptionally high accuracy rate through data verification, attention to detail, and regular quality control checks
• Presented technical perspective for database backup and disaster recovery initiatives resulting in seamless architecture approach
• Provided 24x7 production database support through on call.

positions.title: Book Author
positions.description:
PowerShell Core, the open source, cross-platform that is based on the open source, cross-platform .NET Core, is not a shell that came out by accident; it was intentionally created to be versatile and easy to learn at the same time. PowerShell Core enables automation on systems ranging from the Raspberry Pi to the cloud.

PowerShell Core for Linux Administrators Cookbook uses simple, real-world examples that teach you how to use PowerShell to effectively administer your environment. As you make your way through the book, you will cover interesting recipes on how PowerShell Core can be used to quickly automate complex, repetitive, and time-consuming tasks. In the concluding chapters, you will learn how to develop scripts to automate tasks that involve systems and enterprise management.

By the end of this book, you will have learned about the automation capabilities of PowerShell Core, including remote management using OpenSSH, cross-platform enterprise management, working with Docker containers, and managing SQL databases.

positions.title: Database Technologist
positions.description:
• As a Database Technologist have applied technical knowledge to operate a technology area (e.g. server administration, technical security management, performance management) or customer group with limited risk/complexity.
• Integrates technical knowledge and business understanding to create superior solutions for the company and for customers.
Incident Management: Resolve routine in-scope technical incidents independently.
• Work with team members to resolve more complex incidents.
• Change Management/ Implementation: Independently implements changes/solutions to meet customer and/or trade/IT infrastructure needs within area of technical responsibility.
• Patch and Security Management: Apply patch and security changes per policy.
• Configuration Management: Ensure Configuration Management Database (CMDB) entries are complete and accurate. Solution Design: Understands the company's solutions set and be able to apply these solutions to meet customer and/or trade infrastructure needs within area of responsibility.
• Quality: Provide continual improvement recommendations for direct responsibility area (process improvement, technical standard updates, etc). Project Management: Participate in customer and internal projects, including transformation.
• Customer Relationship Management: Set expectations for customers and/or internal businesses/end users within defined parameters.
• Teamwork: Worked as part of a team, which may be virtual and/or global.

given.text:
Prashanth is an expert level technologist in SQL Server, PowerShell, Linux, Python, BI and more. I collaborated with him, over the course of several years, while curating content for the technical journal SQL Shack Prashanth authored more than 100 articles for SQL Shack, each at least 1,000 words in length. Each article of his passed a rigorous technical review, keyword optimization and thorough copy editing before getting published. His content now ranks in the top 10 search results for hundreds of very competitive and highly searched keywords, and many rank in the top 3 or even first. His content is viewed by hundreds of thousands of site visitors every month. Prasanth worked effectively with our content marketing team from concept, submission, review and publishing. Throughout the process he was extremely diligent in following procedures, responsive to any and all questions and proactive in sourcing high value topics. His velocity, consistency and production was amazing and often created challenges in processing the volume content he created (a good problem to have). I personally worked with Prashanth on a series of articles where we had to solve a technical problem with a combination of tools, SQL and PowerShell. From this, he created a series of authoritative articles but also provided valuable feedback on improvements and optimizations of the underlying technology, which we later implemented In addition to writing content, we hired Prashanth to provide consulting and advice to our product teams to improve their technical solutions. In one case, he duplicated the technical approach to a problem one of our tools solved but did it in a way that was exponentially faster. In this way, he helped isolate a design flaw and was even able to adroitly advise us on how to fix it. Prashanth's strengths, that I valued the most, were his technical acumen, extremely high level of productivity, communication and responsiveness and how effectively he performs in a fast paced and dynamic team environment
